column3: Provides access to hook common functions used in the game.
Provides functionality to have layouts that are always loaded
Required to make Syati Modules run properly
Provides Object Creation factories that other modules can register to. This allows new objects to be recognized by the game.
Allows you to change what icons are on the File Select.
PT: Red Star and Ice Flower
PTD: A Switch that raises the water level to its position.
That one planet from Space Junk...
A module that plays SMG2_title_strm.ast after pressing A + B on FileSelect, similar to SMG1.
A module that plays SMG2_galaxy08_strm.ast after selecting a star on ScenarioSelect, instead of the standard Intro Music.
An FPS Counter for Super Mario Galaxy
A Layout that shows what inputs are being recieved by the game.
